title: Is Dress to Impress Laggy or Slow? Here's How to Fix It

steps.title: Graphics settings, outdated devices, and software bugs can cause lag.
steps.content: Graphics settings, outdated devices, and software bugs can cause lag. Dress to Impress introduced new graphics settings in a recent update, but those settings might be too demanding for your device. Fortunately, you can fix this by tweaking your graphics settings. Lag in Dress to Impress can also be caused by an unstable internet connection, so make sure your internet is working properly.

steps.title: Check your graphics settings.
steps.content: Check your graphics settings. If Dress to Impress is lagging suddenly, your graphics settings might be too high for your device or internet connection. To fix this, you can reduce the quality in your Roblox settings, as well as in your Dress to Impress settings. Here's what to do: Select the Roblox icon. Select Settings . Scroll down to Graphics Mode . Set Graphics Mode to Manual . Select - next to Graphics Quality until it's at the lowest. [1] X Research source Return to Dress to Impress. Select the Dress to Impress settings in the top-left corner. Select Low .

steps.title: Check your internet connection.
steps.content: Check your internet connection. An unstable connection, slow Wi-Fi, or a weak cellular data signal can sometimes make Dress to Impress feel laggy. Make sure your Wi-Fi connection is online and working properly . If you're on Wi-Fi, try disconnecting from the network and reconnecting. If that doesn't help, restarting your router can help speed things up. If you're using cellular data, you'll usually get a faster connection if you switch to Wi-Fi.

steps.title: Restart your device.
steps.content: Restart your device. If Dress to Impress is still laggy, give your computer, phone, or tablet a quick reboot to see if it fixes the problem. If Dress to Impress feels faster after the reboot, there was likely a temporary software bug and nothing to worry about.

steps.title: Update your device.
steps.content: Update your device. Older software versions may be incompatible with Roblox and Dress to Impress, so make sure you keep your device up to date. Whenever you are prompted to install updates, follow the on-screen instructions to install them instead of putting it off. Updates often contain performance fixes that can reduce lag in games.

steps.title: Try playing on a different device.
steps.content: Try playing on a different device. If you play Dress to Impress on a phone, try playing on a computer or vice versa. Older devices may have trouble playing newer games.

steps.title: Contact support if the lagging continues.
steps.content: Contact support if the lagging continues. If Dress to Impress is still running slowly, contact their support team for help. The best way to reach them is to DM or tweet them through their official X/Twitter account. If you don't have X, you can also send an email to support@playdresstoimpress.com.
